page.title: 13Thoughts About My Home
page.content: My name is Bonny Shanks.I live at Little Athill.I think I am very lucky to live in this part of Launceston.It has a very nice view and I get to see lot of farm animals and how they get fed.Also I get to see a lot of crops. From the front of my house you can see lots of fields and woodland and from the back of my house you can see Mr.Lancaster's bungalow and fields.Most of the time I leave the rectangle for entertainment with my friends etc.At home I play with my brother and his friends and if it is sunny we play cricket,football and catch and if its raining we play The A Team,pillow fights or drawing.Although I like living where I do,it would be nice to have some friends within walking distance.
